Class HintSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • HintSystem

  • public class HintSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Hint system that keeps track of number of hints so far, and the max number of hints for a given board's difficulty.

    • Field Summary

      private int numHints 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HintSystem(Sudoku board)
      Constructs a new hint system with max number of hints dependent of the given board's difficulty.
